data.title: Botch to Tour U.K. and Europe Next March
data.text:
Mathcore outfit Botch have got a lot going on since their return last August. For starters, they released their first new song in two decades, then then they began touring the U.S., and now they’ve got their own ridiculous burger over at Kuma’s Corner. And now as they continue touring the U.S. until December at the latest, the band’s unveiled even more plans for live shows — only this time they’re going across the pond for “one last run” through the U.K. and Europe.

Announced earlier today, the shows will run from March 8 in Prague and continue until their final stop in Athens, Greece. All along the way, the band will hit major points like Berlin, Paris, and London. Drummer Tim Latona said the planned run was an exciting prospect, as it’s been a very long time since Botch has been in those markets.

“Going back to tour the EU and UK with Botch is absolutely the fulfilment of a multi-decade dream of mine. We’re so excited to share our music again with all of our fans!”

Tickets for the band’s U.K. and European tour dates are available right now.

Later this month, on October 27, the band will release a remastered version of An Anthology of Dead Ends via Sargent House. Originally recorded and released in 2002 as the band’s de facto swan song, this new version will be available both digitally and on vinyl, should you decide to pre-order it through Sargent House.

For the full list of tour dates, both in the U.S. and abroad, can be found below.

ALL UK and EU BOTCH headline dates, 2024:

March 8 – Prague, CZ – Meet Factory [Tickets]

March 9 – Vienna, AT – Arena [Tickets]

March 10 – Chemnitz, DE – AJZ [Tickets]

March 12 – Berlin, DE – Festsaal Kreuzberg [Tickets]

March 13 – Copenhagen, DK – Vega [Tickets]

March 14 – Hamburg, DE – Uebel & Gefährlich [Tickets]

March 15 – Brussels, BE – Botanique [Tickets]

March 17 – Wiesbaden, DE – Schlachthof [Tickets]

March 18 – Esch-Sur-Alzette, LUX – Rockhal [Tickets]

March 19 – Paris, FR – Elysee Montmartre [Tickets]

March 21 – Bristol, UK – Marble Factory [Tickets]

March 22 – Manchester, UK – New Century Hall [Tickets]

March 23 – London, UK – Electric Ballroom [Tickets]

March 25 – Athens, GR – Gagarin 205 [Tickets]
